description.english: The first fart is the hardest
After eating sausage, it's time for farting
Before farting, you have to eat
The smell of this fart can kill you!

displayName.english: Does your old man know you're a devourer?

description.english: Your old man beeps and farts too!
What would life be without farting?

displayName.english: Burp and fart and then eat!

description.english: In farting is the color of heaven and love

displayName.english: Ah, these women! A man would eat them by the spoonful!

description.english: Women fart always in a cheerful manner
Fat or not - don't worry be happy!
Business is the basis of everything, just like farting
Fart gives life and sometimes kills....
A cow also farts, and sometimes it stinks
Fat or not, eat and fart!
Release the fart, loosen the blockage in the butt
I mean seriously I would have already eaten something....
Are we listening to music or maybe farting?
Cheers to the ladies and gentlemen

displayName.english: I would sooner fail than give up

description.english: Les visiteurs it was a great movie!
This is just the last pizza :D
As Mr. Thaddeus used to say
It will come out to your health!

displayName.english: Ladies and gentlemen, burp with us!
A swine and a pig in one!

description.english: So it goes, the very truth

displayName.english: You look bad from your belly

description.english: but it could have been worse

displayName.english: We will be torn apart by farts, not crows!

description.english: There was even once such a book

displayName.english: Explosion! There was even once such a book

description.english: Congratulations!!! The farts are finally free!
You would be ashamed of yourself!
You are disgusting is an understatement!
Dive deep into the aroma abyss.
Master the art of odorous excellence!
Fuel your obsession with foul fumes.
Haunt the nasal passages with horror!
Devote yourself to the art of gas!
Bet on the unpredictability of gas!
Paint with the palette of putrid!
Generously share the gift of gas.
Gassy Protect the realms with potent gas!
Embrace the essence of foul fiendishness!
Master the maestro of malodorous melodies.
Stalwart in the realm of stink.
